data.message: I'm all for him going hard at the president as he did in the past. But to go at his fans though. Who have different point political views but still love his music and supports him. And he bashes them. Lost some respect for that. I am all for him going after the man and the elites and clebs doesn't matter what political view. But to his own fans though. Idk. And I'm not a Trump supporter, but I think he shouldn't have at his fans who support him. Further dividing everyone when the goal is to come together. And music and arts is the best way.

replies.message: I’m copying this. Such a perfect way to put it
